creator: mikedaly696

content:
mikedaly696 said
I successfully inclued my 3 email accounts but two of them only have inbox and trash folders none of other folders such as drafts, spam ,deleted or trash etc. folders.

By default newly created POP accounts only contain an Inbox and a Trash folder. The other special folders such as Sent, Drafts, Archives, .... will be created when you send or save or archive your first message in this account. A Spam folder will be created when you check "enable adaptive spam controls" in Account Settings > account name > Spam Settings ....
creator: Mapenzi

content: Unfortunately Thunderbird (Mac) CardDav address books don't display contact photos from Contacts.app Even if you succeed to add a photo while editing a contact in the CardDav address book in Thunderbird, it will disappear immediately when you click the "Save" button, no matter which image format you choose. Thunderbird and macOS address books never liked each other very much......
creator: Mapenzi
